Class IsoDateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.util.IsoDateUtils

  • @ThreadSafe
@LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public final class IsoDateUtils
extends Object
    Helper utility class to handle date operations.

      • parseIsoDatetime

        public static Date parseIsoDatetime(String datetime,
                    TimeZone timeZone)
                             throws ParseException
        Parses an ISO 8601 timezone-formatted string into a Date relative to a TimeZone.
        Parameters:
        datetime - An ISO 8601 formatted datetime with timezone.
        timeZone - The relative TimeZone.
        Returns:
        a parsed Date relative to the given TimeZone.
        Throws:
        ParseException - if there was a problem parsing the date.

        Parameters:
        date - The date to convert.
        timeZone - The relative TimeZone.
        Returns:
        An ISO 8601 formatted datetime relative to the given TimeZone.
